reference.title: Revision history
reference.shortdesc: The following table contains information about revisions to this document.

strow.stentry: Kristen James Eberlein and Carlos Evia

Generated working draft #04, which includes the following changes:
Updated list of editors and citation format
Added appendix for aggregated RFC-2119 statements
Updated OASIS boilerplate content
Updated key definition maps
Added XDITA attributes content

Generated working draft #05, which includes the following changes:
Added HDITA and MDITA attributes content
Updated table in 4.3 "LwDITA attributes in the authoring formats"
Added "LwDITA components, A to Z"
Updated company affiliations in the "Acknowledgments" topic

Generated working draft #06, which includes the following changes:
Updated "LwDITA components, A to Z" to include all elements
Corrected syntax for MDITA representation of a table

Generated working draft #07, which includes the following changes:
Addition of the tt element
Addition of the video-poster element
New format for "Syntax" section in the map, metadata, multimedia, and table components topics
Updated "Examples" sections in map, metadata, multimedia, and table component topics
